DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single-ascending dose study healthy volunteer , enrol single site United States investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics DSTA4637S .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics DSTA4637S Healthy Volunteers
